meeting_request.purpose: Struggling to adjust to college and find my footing
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Selena, a first-year Sociology major. I’ve taken a mix of humanities and social science courses, but I’m still trying to figure out what I’m supposed to do here. My major is interesting, but I don’t really know what I’m supposed to be doing. I’ve taken some classes that are really heavy on social issues, but I don’t really understand how to apply that to my major. I also feel like I don’t fit in with the other students here, even though I’m from a different socioeconomic background. I’m worried I’m not doing well enough to be a Sociology major, and I’m not sure how to get help.
